channel.title: Is there something wrong with this code?

item.title: Is there something wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

sk8rdude461:

I don’t know any server that uses send

This can be altered VERY easily. I’ve seen some with ‘pushMessage’ (originally Client-sided), ‘chatString’, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there something wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“TGMagma, post:3, topic:477854”]saveCharacter = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“You must wait a few seconds from being out of combat before you can do this.”);
}
}
}
I fixed it.[/quote]
You could at least say thank you. I did, in fact, point out the error

Read full topic
